ISSUE.TITLE: Problem in moving child category from one category to onther
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.3 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1- Go to admin/categories 2- Search for Shoes category 3- Change Parent category from Apparel to Books 4- In main menu Apparel, Shoes directory will disappear and you can show it in Book menu (That's OK) 5- If you clicked on Apparel category in main web site you still see Shoes (That's wrong because we moved it) 6- If you clicked on Book category in main web site you will see Shoes (That's OK). 7- If I clear cache from admin page then every thing will be fine. I thing problem is not deleting Shoes from Apparel in cache ![01](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/49324748/82028230-0587b380-969e-11ea-991c-5fc6383ddafd.jpg) ![02](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/49324748/82028264-0fa9b200-969e-11ea-8544-07dad79f3399.jpg)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #4758 Fixed problem with moving child category
